text: does anyone have plans on attending this? <https://www.alterconf.com/>
tickets are pretty inexpensive, i think it could be worthwhile for a few folks to check out
Just heard about it today actually from Paul Searle, who did our Sommely video.
There may be an opportunity to sponsor the conference video as well (which he was going to send me the details for).
I’ve been chatting with one of the speakers on a slack community I belong to: <https://www.alterconf.com/talks/power-secrets>
i am a huge fan of alterconf
Long way of saying I support someone attending (lmk if anyone needs a CC).
okay cool! i’m going to buy a ticket for myself then :smile:
if we do sponsor we can get in on the job fair which might be a good thing to do?
Let me find out more from Paul to see if we could get something similar if we sponsor the video through his efforts. What's the sponsorship level for job fair access?
